rukus.text: Tabaraka Al-Ladhi Biyadihi Al-Mulku Wa Huwa `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Al-Ladhi Khalaqa Al-Mawta Wa Al-Hayaata Liyabluwakum 'Ayyukum 'Ahsanu `Amalaan Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Al-Ghafuru
Al-Ladhi Khalaqa Sab`a Samawatin Tibaqaan Ma Tara Fi Khalqi Ar-Rahmani Min Tafawutin Farji`i Al-Basara Hal Tara Min Futurin
Thumma Arji`i Al-Basara Karratayni Yanqalib 'Ilayka Al-Basaru Khasi'aan Wa Huwa Hasirun
Wa Laqad Zayyanna As-Sama'a Ad-Dunya Bimasabiha Wa Ja`alnaha Rujumaan Lilshayatini Wa 'A`tadna Lahum `Adhaba As-Sa`iri
Wa Lilladhina Kafaru Birabbihim `Adhabu Jahannama Wa Bi'sa Al-Masiru
Idha 'Ulqu Fiha Sami`u Laha Shahiqaan Wa Hiya Tafuru
Takadu Tamayyazu Mina Al-Ghayzi Kullama 'Ulqiya Fiha Fawjun Sa'alahum Khazanatuha 'Alam Ya'tikum Nadhirun
Qalu Bala Qad Ja'ana Nadhirun Fakadhabna Wa Qulna Ma Nazzala Allahu Min Shay'in 'In 'Antum 'Illa Fi ƒêalalin Kabirin
Wa Qalu Law Kunna Nasma`u 'Aw Na`qilu Ma Kunna Fi 'Ashabi As-Sa`iri
Inna Al-Ladhina Yakhshawna Rabbahum Bil-Ghaybi Lahum Maghfiratun Wa 'Ajrun Kabirun
Wa 'Asirru Qawlakum 'Aw Ajharu Bihi 'Innahu `Alimun Bidhati As-Suduri
Ala Ya`lamu Man Khalaqa Wa Huwa Al-Latifu Al-Khabiru
